Jobs.Name: Junior C# Developer
Jobs.Description: A well-established property solutions company in the Free State area is looking for a skilled C# .Net Developer to join their talented and experienced team. This could be the perfect opportunity for the new year!

Jobs.Name: Senior C# Developer
Jobs.Description: Seeking an experienced C# Developer in Cape Town for a Well-Known IT Company. Experience with the following technologies: C#, .NET Core, SQL, JavaScript, MS SQL, CSS, HTML, SVN, ASP.NET MVC, RESTful Web Services

Jobs.Name: Technical Consultant
Jobs.Description: Consultants are responsible for ensuring that key relationships with our clients are developed and maintained; assisting them from project inception to 'go live. They gather customer requirements by liaising with business teams to produce the right specifications, before configuring our product to meet the needs of our clients and managing the full development cycle and subsequent implementation.

Jobs.Name: Digital Designer
Jobs.Description: Catch + Release is looking to hire a junior to mid Digital Designer. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showing design ability and be able to work in Sketch.

Jobs.Name: IT Manager
Jobs.Description: As the local IT Manager you will be accountable for providing IT support & services aligned with Red Bull’s local and global IT strategy. You will capture local business strategies, determine the organization’s technology needs, and enable strategies by providing state-of-the-art IT services and support.
